tql.tql:
SELECT id FROM slack_identify.get_channels_list
  WHERE name="lunch"
  LIMIT 20

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://www.transposit.com/docs/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT ts, attachments[2].fields FROM slack_identify.get_conversations_history
  WHERE inclusive=true
  AND channel=@channel_id
  AND username='Polly'
  LIMIT 1000

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://www.transposit.com/docs/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT * FROM google_sheets.append_sheet_values
  WHERE valueInputOption='INPUT_VALUE_OPTION_UNSPECIFIED | RAW | USER_ENTERED'
  AND range='<required_string>'
  AND spreadsheetId='<required_string>'
  AND responseValueRenderOption='FORMATTED_VALUE | UNFORMATTED_VALUE | FORMULA'
  AND insertDataOption='OVERWRITE | INSERT_ROWS'
  AND responseDateTimeRenderOption='SERIAL_NUMBER | FORMATTED_STRING'
  AND includeValuesInResponse=<boolean>
  AND $body=(SELECT {
    'majorDimension' : 'DIMENSION_UNSPECIFIED | ROWS | COLUMNS',
    'values' : [ [ { } ] ],
    'range' : '<string>'
  })

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://www.transposit.com/docs/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

dataConnections.title: Slack
